name: Arlena Diep
text: First off, I just wanted to say how nice the delivery guy was! I didn't catch his name, but he was super nice and got here so quick! Supreme pizza and fries are delicious. We ordered hot buffalo wings and asked for ranch and blue cheese, â€¦More

name: Robert Staffa
text: The newly designed fast food restaurant offers a great selection. Love the meat lovers deep dish pizza. I've been lucky enough to have helpful and pleasant waitresses handle my table. Worth the stop.

name: Bob Naftal
text: We hadn't been to this Hut in about a year, due to terrible food , twice. We thought we'd have another go and are happy we did. Total turn around on the food! Best Pizza Hut pizza in ages and wings also very good. They have the salad bar here and the cesaer salad was also. Very good!

name: Josh Bell
text: The pizza hut buffet is good if you are in the mood for pizza and bread sticks.  There is always plenty of both.  It is a quick inexpensive lunch option.

name: Barb Bayer
text: Not many sit down Pizza hut around. Fresh hot and great service

name: Bridgette Schrack
text: To start, we walked in and no one greeted us for like 5+ minutes. There were 3 people working and they all took a smoke break at the same time. They did not wash their hands when they came back in, and the waitress smelled awful of â€¦More

name: OG Exze
text: Great food. Great buffet. They ensured they had food out constantly, even when the place got packed with people. I did not have an issue with them at all. Man behind the register kept the tables clean as everyone ate and didn't have any issue with how messy we got! I would definitely go to this buffet again. It was fun!

name: The Halloweenie's Emporium
text: Can't even reach them on the phone! Get put on hold for about 10 minutes, then - even when it sounds like someone has picked up - there's nobody there! Then, after about another 20-30 seconds, the call just disconnects!ðŸ˜  Not impressed. â€¦More

name: Tammy Kaczor
text: Recently had a birthday party there. Everyone was so friendly and helpful. The food was excellent. We were so glad we went.

name: Itâ€™s Renji
text: Iâ€™ve ordered pizza from here all the time and the only times I have food experiences are on Saturdays or Fridays. I donâ€™t know whatâ€™s different if they have different people cooking them on those days, new ingredients, etc. but the pizza â€¦More

name: Karen Walla
text: One of the few pizza huts in the area that lets you eat in or take out. Recently renovated, this restaurant is consistent with other pizza hut experiences.  Reliable, fast and inexpensive and the pizza is good and hot. Not necessarily the best pizza, but it is still pretty decent.

name: mrsmusicforlife 2185
text: Remodeling looks nice! Breadsticks are always soft and fresh. The best Pizza Hut location around

name: Jennifer Shanholtz
text: Very nice and helpful.... clean and well managed

name: Jutt Laing
text: Always get quality deep dish, and they are the fastest delivery restaurant around. We typically get our pizza at our door 20 minutes after ordering it. Quality always the same, and our order is always correct.

name: Jody Beck
text: We love this Pizza Hut. We love the service and the pizza is always reliable. It's Pizza Hut. They always accommodate me with a bowl of romaine, no dressing, ready to start my trip to the salad bar. We take our 2 yr old and 7 yr old grandson there often and the staff is so wonderful.

name: Mason Doria
text: No answer and can't order online bc it's not on their website. Guessing it's closed.

name: Ted G
text: The restaurant is clean and spacious, and the staff is fantastic, but the pizza doesn't seem as good as I remember from years ago.  Wings are big and meaty, although definitely not as good as many other places nearby. With so many good pizzerias in the Gilbertsville/Boyertown area, I'd have to put Pizza Hut low end.

name: Allen Adams
text: Second time not only did I have to wait in my car for carry out, but they forgot about me. Didn't offer anything to make up for waiting longer for my order.

name: Anthony Williams
text: A friend placed an order online but the store never received it. She was entering the order as we were driving the 20 mins to the store. Even though we arrived right at closing and had a very large order the manager made sure we got everything ordered and timely. No complaints. Kudos to everyone there that night.

name: April
text: Love the drive thru when I have my kiddo with me. Pizza is good, hot, and comes how I ordered! Love ordering online for pick up.

name: Travis Dawson
text: This location gets food cooked correctly and out quickly! They offer delivery which is always a great option when you are strapped for time! The atmosphere is nice and laid back. They offer a good buffet as well that you can't go wrong with!

name: Justin Gaugler
text: Some people are just cocky and the person that served us was very cocky but otherwise it was a good experience

name: juuni85
text: Was very happy with the way the pizza came out. Haven't had the Pizza Hut buffet in a long time, so excited to try it sometime soon!

name: Marshall Andrien
text: Orders are always fresh & delivered quickly. I do delivery for over $30 of deliciousness almost weekly. Favorite joint for quick tasty sustenance.

name: Biff Johnson
text: Excellent dining experience. All foods were perfectly prepared and the friendly staff were attentive, yet non-intrusive. Everything I have tried on their menu is fantastic.

name: April Treat
text: Love the fact they have a salad bar back.

name: Dale Leader
text: Been a while since I was at a Pizza Hut, but the pizza hasn't changed, still just as good as before.

name: Amy Christman
text: Super impressed with the renovations.  Fast service, reasonable prices and of course yummy food!

name: Harriet Hernandez
text: Great Customer Service when dining in but the employees on night shift need a little more training when ordering take-out. I had ordered take-out and an hour and a half later I get a call saying they can't deliver to me. Why wait an hour â€¦More

name: Chad Springer
text: The Gilbertsville Pizza Hut has been renovated since I was there last and is super nice inside and very clean. Got a thin crust pizza which was really good and crispy. The kids enjoyed a personal pizza and they seemed happy with it.

name: Lisa Lauer
text: Today I went to the buffet.....NEVER AGAIN at this location!!! It started by getting sat at a dirty table. Then we go get the first batch of the buffet which was completely cold and under cooked. Also they had box of mop heads and cleaning â€¦More

name: Becca Johns
text: We walk in at 8:15 on a Friday they are open till 11 they would not seat nor serve us

name: Cindy Pettinato
text: Excellent service

name: Richard Silver
text: This is only the second time we have eaten here, last time was for a fundraiser (so that doesn't count). For a PH,  what a nice and clean facility, with good food and nice staff.

name: Carrie Love
text: This place was remodeled and is amazing. Food is so great and so is the atmosphere. The servers were attentive and friendly.

name: S G
text: The lunch buffet is out of this world!!!

name: kelly showalter
text: Always so friendly...and that pizza and chicken is always yummy!!!!

name: The Main Hudock E-Mail
text: Their Pizza is better than all the other places I've been to.

name: Adam R
text: Didn't get my fries when I picked up.  Called them and they said they were waiting and to pick them up. Got most of my order otherwise.

name: Francisco Gonzalez
text: Great pizza and hot and the hut taste u looking for

name: Michael Birmingham Jr.
text: Good food and service. Looks great after remodel.

name: Adam Donkus
text: Wish they still served beer. But had a deep dish supreme..

name: Jadama 14
text: They had good food for Pizza Hut standards. Overall, it was good but, the waitress was slow ,delivering  the food. but overall, it was an okay visit to pizza hut for dinner.

name: Dan Ramos
text: Super fast service. Very nice waitress. Pizza nice and hot. Definitely coming again.

name: christina adams
text: They were really nice and helped me to get the best deal possible.

name: Gary Major
text: Food was okay, typlical Pizza Hut, and the help is always nice and freindly. But the owner should be totally disappointed with the renovations he had done.  The look of the place, both inside and out are obviously done by the lowest bidder. â€¦More

name: Shane's Garage
text: The remodel is horribly done. Place is dirty. Staff are great but the place isnt. If it looks dirty, what do u think the kitchen looks like?

name: Jeff Boxtruck
text: Haven't been here in years decide to give it a try great meal was great and they recently remodeled the place.

name: Missie Mostafa
text: Great waitress and service. Some things are different thought.

name: Stevi Platzer
text: I had the buffet it was really good for the price.

name: Sean McDevitt
text: It is Pizza Hut.  It was fast and quick place to grab pizza.  In their defense, we live near great pizza places, both traditional and modern.

name: Jimmy Benson
text: Food was good for a Friday night busy time and our waitress was great and prompt and very merry for being so busy

name: Steve Elko
text: We always get seated quickly and their staff is very friendly. The food is good but not great but then again it Pizza Hut.

name: Merrie Schonbach
text: Food is still good, staff is attentive, never a problem getting a seat.

name: Diane Barto
text: Very nice place . Prices are a little high but you can get coupons on your phone . They also have the $10.00 box  which is a great deal. â˜º

name: Cecelia Lehman
text: We absolutely love Pizza Hut.. We go there several times a year!

name: Ashley Grebe
text: We had a great waitress, very friendly

name: Alex Slaby
text: Newly remodeled but the same food. If you like Pizza Hut pizzas, you're in the right place.

name: Robert Chung
text: Great Pizza in town.

name: rygar gaming
text: The waitress there is awesome

name: jennifer Haas
text: Great pizza. N great service

name: Wendy Clark
text: Pizza is always great... Staff was very friendly as well.

name: Victor Falli
text: Place could be cleaner. Pizza is good.

name: Stephanie Eisenbise
text: Service was okay  food was cold

name: kurtis hoffman
text: The last pizza I ordered wasnâ€™t fully cooked,and it fell apart,this time that I ordered slices were on top of each other

name: Shirl Raser
text: Good service, lovely employees â˜º

name: Dan Augustine
text: Place is dirty, menus stick to your hands (not just mine, all three at the table) bathrooms are dirty and need updating badly. The whole place needs to be remodeled.. â€¦More

name: Marco Soto
text: Always clean, wonderful service, organized staff.

name: Bridget Grover
text: Ever since they reopened their pizzas have been undercooked and really doughy. Pizza barley melted. Every disappointed. Either new staff or they just don't care

name: MachOne Man
text: Excellent service had our food out in no time good atmosphere. A+++

name: Nancy Kline
text: The food is tasty, especially the bread sticks.

name: Michelle Stamm
text: Very good tonight.

name: Anthony O'neal
text: Had a $10 off if you purchase $20 or more from an online survey and when I I'll be ordered online it wouldn't go through so I called them and they said no problem and they took it off for me awesome

name: Becky Davidson
text: Wing Wednesday is awesome!

name: Helena Davis
text: waited 2 hours for 3 pizza to be delivered and still had to go pick it up at the store

name: Nikole Ballard
text: Clean and polite service

name: Mike Erb
text: Buffet was not very good even by pizza hut standards.wont be back

name: Jitza Cruz
text: Such a nice pizza hut

name: Wendy Clark
text: Love the bundle boxes...

name: Daniel Hostetter
text: Pizza was horrible

name: Pete Gattinella
text: So so

name: Lisa Steckiel
text: Yum.

text: Great

name: Ed Bradley
text: Awesome!

name: Vladdy Sidorenko
text: About the only pizza shop left with stuffed crust

name: Carole Himes
text: Nice and good

name: judy perkins
text: We were there on a cold and windy day and they had the air conditioning on and the blower was flowing right on us but they refused to turn it off . I will not return to that place

name: chip lewis
text: Very impressed

name: Jeff Angstadt
text: The manager was awesome  !!

name: Robert Krause
